item.title: 16 Rich Habits
item.description:
16 Rich Habits

Intelligence, talent and charm are great, but more often than not these aren't what separate the wealthiest among us from the poorest. Instead, the differences are in our daily habits. Do you realize that these subconscious, second-nature activities make up 40 percent of our waking hours?

item.title: The 10 most expensive cars in the world
item.description:
The 10 most expensive cars in the world

April 6, 2016 In life, you get what you pay for. And for some very wealthy gearheads, forking over the big bucks means getting ludicrous amounts of speed, industry-leading technology and a whole lot of prestige. Hit the track in any one of these supercars and you'll quickly understand why these vehicles cost as much as they do.

item.title: 20 Most Expensive Houses In The World
item.description:
20 Most Expensive Houses In The World

Have you ever wondered what the finest and most expensive houses could look like? Then here, with combined information from Forbes, we bring you images of the world's most expensive homes, designed by professional and talented

item.title: Don't Gamble On Binary Options
item.description:
Don't Gamble On Binary Options

New Internet fad purports to offer a low-risk way to make money fast. Don't be fooled. You might as well play roulette.

item.title: "FERI IS " - FERI Designer Lines at the Emmy Awards, (2013)
item.description:
"FERI IS " - FERI Designer Lines at the Emmy Awards, (2013)

FERI at the Emmys

item.title: What I Wish I Knew Before Buying Rental Property - The Simple Dollar
item.description:
What I Wish I Knew Before Buying Rental Property - The Simple Dollar

In early 2006, my husband and I decided to purchase our first home in my hometown of Greenfield, Indiana. With 1,300 square feet, a few nice-sized bedrooms, and an open kitchen and living room, our first "starter home" was practically perfect for us.

item.title: How to Invest $1000 in the Best Ways | Online Trading Academy
item.description:
How to Invest $1000 in the Best Ways | Online Trading Academy

Let's say you have exactly $1,000 and want to make an investment in the financial markets. Determining how to invest your money is an important decision. What do you do? Should you invest $1,000 in stocks, futures, options or a combination? What's the best way to invest $1,000 today?

item.title: Five Ways To Save Money - To Be A Millionaire
item.description:
Five Ways To Save Money - To Be A Millionaire

Reaching a cool million is still a goal for many people. There's plenty of advice out there on how to reach the $1 million target from self-made millionaires, self proclaimed investment gurus and unfortunately, many unscrupulous people looking to take advantage of your emotions.

item.title: What Does It Mean to Be Rich? - Defining Wealth by Income, Net Worth & Lifestyle
item.description:
What Does It Mean to Be Rich? - Defining Wealth by Income, Net Worth & Lifestyle

If you pick any 10 people at random off the street and ask them all whether they'd like to be rich, chances are all 10 will say yes. But if you ask those same 10 people what they mean by "rich," you're likely to get 10 different answers.

item.title: 21 outrageous ways the super rich spend their money
item.description:
21 outrageous ways the super rich spend their money

What do you do with billions of dollars? That's what Robert Frank, host of " Secret Lives of the Super Rich," tries to uncover on the CNBC show, which gives viewers VIP access into the extravagant lives of the wealthiest people on the planet.
